sentence.Network_en: Afflictions are sometimes blessings in disguise.
In Britain, we have so far escaped, in large measure, either of these afflictions.
sentence.Network_cn: 在英国，我们迄今为止已经远远地避开了这两类麻烦。

sentence.Network_en: She affected to be spunky about her ailments and afflictions, but she was in fact an utterly self - centered valetudinarian.
sentence.Network_cn: 她装做对自己的失调和苦恼若无其事, 但是实际上她是为自己的健康状况非常发愁的人.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...诗节中，诗人进一步道出沮丧的原因，即太多的 “ 苦事 ” （ afflictions ）把诗人压得匍匐在地（ bore me down to earth），每一次  …
Scientists are only beginning to understand these afflictions ., 科学家不过是刚刚开始了解这些相关症状.
We shall rest from all these troublesome afflictions ., 我们应当从这些麻烦苦恼之中停下来 , 休息一下.
physical and mental afflictions are now known by less forthright names than twenty of thirty years ago .对于肉体上和精神上受到的病痛折磨现在不象二十年前或三十年前那样直言不讳了。

list.abs: We should help people in affliction ., 我们应该帮助在苦难之中的人们.
此外,还有第三种意识——烦恼识(afflicted consciousness),又称为“末那识”或思量识、作意识、相续识、分别识。烦恼识没有明性,经常都处于充满“我”的念头及.
For You save an afflicted people , But haughty eyes You abase ., 困苦的百姓 , 你必拯救 ． 高傲的眼目 , 你必使他降卑.
dream_nimin131_wordpress_blog ... 逭逭/ escape from/ 患处患处/ afflicted part/ 幻灯幻灯/ lantern slides/.

entry.def: An affliction is something which causes physical or mental suffering.

example.ex: Hay fever is an affliction which arrives at an early age.
example.tran: 枯草热是年纪较小时会患的一种病。

auth_sentence.content: I feel that I truly relate to your afflictions.
auth_sentence.res_content: I feel that I truly relate to your afflictions.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I feel that I truly relate to your afflictions.

auth_sentence.content: He...cherished his afflictions like a hypochondriac.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He...cherished his afflictions like a hypochondriac.

auth_sentence.content: It...more than countervails all the calamities and afflictions which can possibly befal us.
auth_sentence.res_content: It...more than countervails all the calamities and afflictions which can possibly befal us.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It...more than countervails all the calamities and afflictions which can possibly befal us.
